titleStmt.title: Receipt (Certificate) for work performed for the penthemeral dyke corv»®e
titleStmt.author: Isidoros

revisionDesc.change: Pull translation out of APIS record.

div.ab: The ninth year of the Emperor Caesar Nerva Trajan Augustus Germanicus Dacicus. Has worked for five days in fulfillment of his obligation of the same ninth year for work on the embankments, (2nd hand) in the new six-gate sluice from Pauni 18 to 22, (on behalf of) Karanis, Ptollis, son of Pamenes, grandson of Tithoes, whose mother is Tanephremmis. I, Isidoros, have signed it.

listBibl.bibl: Pearl OM, Aegyptus 31, 223-224, 1951 -- SB VI 9231, 1 -- BL V, 111 (on line 1); BL VII, 204 (on line 6). - In lines 2-3, instead of me(nos) ; Paun[i hyp(er)], read: eph' he(meron) ; pent[e hyp(er)]. In line 4, read exath(uro) Pau(ni). (PH)
